data.name: FSX Steam Edition: Night Environment Denmark Add-On
data.detailed_description:
Night Environment: Denmark for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your night flying experience in Denmark. Using a series of databases, this add-on adds appropriate types of lighting to different kinds of roads and other areas. 100,000s of lights clearly show how both highways and smaller roads alike. Visual navigation at night becomes an absolute joy with this stunning pack!

The Night Environment database contains an incredible amount of accurate road data, illuminating roads at night which you wouldn’t normally see. Our lights have up to a 60 mile radius, so large urban areas and highway junctions will illuminate all around you as you fly. As the highway lights are raised above the surface and have a lit bitmap below them, a realistic 3D effect is created.

Night Environment also comes with a configuration tool so you can customize the intensity of your night flying experience.

Features:

  • Full coverage of Denmark.
  • All major roads and most smaller roads are illuminated.
  • Compatible with other scenery add-ons (including Orbx FTX and most photoscenery).
  • Configurable for hardware performance.
  • Management tool, accessible via the Steam Tools menu, which allows you to toggle and adjust the output of all types of lights.

fullgame.name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features
